pageProps.title: Wild Futures Working Group
body: The Wild Futures Working Group explores how designers can collaborate  with rewilding communities to support societal shifts towards more  regenerative relationships between people and land.

Using a real-world rewilding project in Surrey as a case study, the  working group uses on-the-ground interviews with rewilders and a range  of multimedia design methods to envision a new baseline for what natural  spaces should look like in the UK.
